articles.title: Minor dies after alleged rape in Bengal, family says body cremated without autopsy - India Today
articles.description: A minor girl on Sunday died after she was raped at a birthday party in West Bengal's Nadia district. Her family has alleged that the victim's body was cremated without an autopsy under pressure by a local TMC leader, whose son is the prime accused in the case

articles.title: We want peace with India, but it's not possible without resolution of Kashmir issue: Shahbaz Sharif - India Today
articles.description: Ahead of taking over as the PM of Pakistan, Shahbaz Sharif said that he wants harmony in the country. "We want peace with India, but peace is not possible without resolution of the Kashmir issue," he said.
